data2$P_G_ratio <- data2$usd_pledged_real/data2$usd_goal_real
data2$P_B_ratio <- data2$usd_pledged_real/data2$backers
data2$time_diff <- strptime(data2$deadline,'%m/%d/%Y') - strptime(data2$launched,'%m/%d/%Y')
data2$date <- format(as.Date(as.character(data2$deadline),"%m/%d/%Y"),"%Y %m")
nrow(data2)*.7
